advantages.title: Advantages of Our Solutions
items: 100% compliance with modern data storage requirements
Support in Russian and Kyrgyz languages

audience.title: Who Our Solutions Are For
items: Anyone requiring reliable data storage: surveillance, backups, databases

blurb.title: Additional Capabilities
blurb.text: For anyone needing dev environments, staging servers, API/back-end deployments, and VPN or proxy setups. We provide dedicated servers for hosting software, sites, and applications with flexible configuration, high reliability, and local data hosting. Infrastructure powered by ISPsystem.ru.
